alert.note: Alert for Issaquena; Sharkey; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 2:13PM CDT until March 30 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Chicot County in southeastern Arkansas... East Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Eastern West Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 212 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms capable of producing a tornado were located along a line extending from near Jones to near Goodwill to near Bakers, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * These dangerous storms will be near... Oak Grove around 225 PM CDT. Eudora and Monticello around 230 PM CDT. Millikin, Gassoway and Shelburn around 235 PM CDT. Alsatia and Sondheimer around 240 PM CDT. Transylvania and Glen Allan around 245 PM CDT. Fitler around 250 PM CDT. Onward and Panther Burn around 255 PM CDT. Rolling Fork around 305 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these tornadic storms include Mayersville, Kilbourne, Forest and Cary. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
